availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David B. Jones (Montgomery County, Kentucky, farmer and constable)

body.p: Montgomery County, Kentucky, farmer and constable. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Jones and Frances Jones. Married to Amanda J. Planck Jones in Fleming County, Kentucky, on November 12, 1861. Father of James F. Jones and Thomas Jones. Farmer in Montgomery County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned seven enslaved persons in Montgomery County in 1850. Constable in Montgomery County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Montgomery County in 1860. Household owned an additional seven enslaved persons in Montgomery County in 1860. Farmer in Montgomery County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, District 1, p. 29A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, District 1, p. 77
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, p. 264.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, p. 77B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clark County, Kiddville, p. 82B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Fleming County Marriages, Film 005552779, p. 111.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Montgomery County, KY, October 1863, p. 80.
"D.B. Jones (1825-1877)," Find A Grave, Memorial 84920887, accessed October 16, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/84920887.
